cmput301.textbookhub.Models

Class DataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.textbookhub.Models.DataHelper

  • public class DataHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    DataHelper is used to upload and download information to/from Elastic Search.
    Since:
    2016/03/12 Created by Jayden on 2016-03-12. Based on the code built by esports

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataHelper.AddTextbookTask
      Add a Textbook(s) to the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.AddUserTask
      Adds User(s) to the ElasticSearch server
      static class  DataHelper.DeleteTextbookTask
      Delete Textbook(s) from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.GetAllTextbookTask
      Get all Textbook(s) from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.GetBiddedTextbookByBidderTask
      Get bidded Textbook(s) by a specific bidder from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.GetTextbookByBorrowerTask
      Get Textbook(s) currently borrowed from by a specific User from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.GetTextbookTask
      Get Textbook(s) from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.GetUserTask
      Get User(s) from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.SearchTextbookTask
      Search for Textbook(s) from the ElasticSearch server.
      static class  DataHelper.TestServerConnectionTask
      This class is used mainly to test server connectivity
      static class  DataHelper.UpdateTextbookTask
      Update the Textbook(s) information on ElasticSearch from local memory.
      static class  DataHelper.UpdateUserTask
      Update the information of the current User on the ElasticSearch server.
